channel.title: Abouts on Apache Iceberg
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Apache Iceberg

item.title: What is Iceberg?
item.description: Iceberg adds tables to compute engines including Spark, Trino, PrestoDB, Flink and Hive using a high-performance table format that works just like a SQL table. and avoids unpleasant surprises. Learn More
